verses.name: Nehemiah 13:12
verses.text: Then brought all Judah the tithe of the corn and the new wine and the oil unto the treasuries.

verses.name: Nehemiah 13:13
verses.text: And I made treasurers over the treasuries, Shelemiah the priest, and Zadok the scribe, and of the Levites, Pedaiah: and next to them was Hanan the son of Zaccur, the son of Mattaniah: for they were counted faithful, and their office was to distribute unto their brethren.

verses.name: Nehemiah 13:14
verses.text: Remember me, O my God, concerning this, and wipe not out my good deeds that I have done for the house of my God, and for the offices thereof.
